name: css-inline/php
description: High-performance library for inlining CSS into HTML 'style' attributes

scripts.bench: EXT=$(if [ "$(uname)" = "Darwin" ]; then echo 'dylib'; else echo 'so'; fi) && phpbench run --report=default --iterations=10 --revs=100 --php-config='{"extension": "target/release/libcss_inline_php.'$EXT'"}'
